verbose_text: To improve disinfection performance and secure a complete deactivation of SARS-CoV-2, the dosage of sodium hypochlorite was increased to 6700 g/m 3 since 6th March and free chlorine in the effluents on 10th March ranged from 21.0 to 25.0 mg/L at 12-h after supplementing sodium hypochlorite.
evidence: SARS-CoV-2, the dosage of sodium hypochlorite was increased
